page.title: 03Amenities in Sedgley (1)
page.content:
{Bank,Building Societies,Post {Office,Chemist,Market,Library,Primary {School,Doctors Surgery,Nature {Reserve,Church,Scouts Groups,Fish and {Chips Shops,Chinese Takeaway,Telephone {Boxes,Parks,Shops,Dentist.
{Banks: {} I use the{bank}so that I know my money will be safe without the risk of it being stolen.Also I can get extra money with the interest I get.
{Building Societies: {} I use the{Building Society}so that in later life when I am married I should be able to afford a house and other things to help me along in life.Also I can get personal loans if I do not have enough money.
